content: I'm currently updating the rustc-dev-guide section on rustdoc's passes, but there are several that I haven't touched and so I was just guessing what they did. I would appreciate if you (Guillaume, Joshua, or someone else) could take a quick look to make sure it's correct! Here are the docs in question: https://github.com/rust-lang/rustc-dev-guide/pull/1048#discussion_r570529644
